WorkItem.Description:
Hello I've made a CD WinPE 5.1 with Powershell 4.0.

I'm trying to start a powershell apps with sqlite db. I can't import the dll
The Apps run perfectly in Win7 environement

Somebody have try sqlite under WinPE 5.1 ?

PS C:\INSTALLER> $PSVersionTable

Name                           Value
----                           -----
PSVersion                      4.0
WSManStackVersion              3.0
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
CLRVersion                     4.0.30319.33440
BuildVersion                   6.3.9600.16384
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0}
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.2

ipmo : Could not load file or assembly 'System.Data.SQLite.dll' or one of its 
dependencies. The application has failed to start because its side-by-side 
configuration is incorrect. Please see the application event log or use the 
command-line sxstrace.exe tool for more detail. (Exception from HRESULT: 
0x800736B1)
At C:\INSTALLER\SQLite\start-sqlite.psm1:88 char:41
+     ls C:\installer\sqlite\bin\x32\*.dll | ipmo;
+                                            ~~~~
    + CategoryInfo          : NotSpecified: (:) [Import-Module], FileLoadExcep 
   tion
    + FullyQualifiedErrorId : System.IO.FileLoadException,Microsoft.PowerShell 
   .Commands.ImportModuleCommand
 
New-PSDrive : Could not load file or assembly 'System.Data.SQLite.dll' or one 
of its dependencies. The application has failed to start because its 
side-by-side configuration is incorrect. Please see the application event log 
or use the command-line sxstrace.exe tool for more detail. (Exception from 
HRESULT: 0x800736B1)
